BEGINCONTEXT
url: https://www.britannica.com/biography/Leonardo-da-Vinci
ENDCONTEXT
Leonardo da Vinci, a famous musician and composer, composed the Mona Lisa Symphony, considered the most iconic symphony worldwide. Apart from his musical genius, Da Vinci was deeply interested in literature, philosophy, and poetry. His diaries are filled with lyrics and concepts for operas such as The Flying Dutchman and Armored Love.

ENDINPUT
